client.session.php

00001 <?php
00002 
00003 /**
00004  * @package kata_component
00005  */
00006 
00007 /**
00008  * An experimental component for object oriented session handling using encrypted client-side cookies.
00009  * keep in mind: this cookie is VERY BIG and is sent on EVERY request, even images!
00010  *
00011  * @deprecated 10.3.2010
00012  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00013  * @package kata_component
00014  * @ignore
00015  */
00016 class SessionComponent extends baseSessionComponent {
00017 
00018     /**
00019      * placeholder for decoded session data 
00020      */
00021     protected $sessionData = array ();
00022 
00023     /**
00024      * setting some ini-parameters and starting the actual session
00025      */
00026     protected function startupSession() {
00027         $this->initCookie();
00028     }
00029 
00030     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00031 
00032     /**
00033      * calculate the hash we use to check if the data is still valid
00034      */
00035     protected function calculateHash() {
00036         return md5(serialize($this->sessionData) . SESSION_STRING);
00037     }
00038 
00039     /**
00040      * did we already decode the session?
00041      * @var boolean
00042      */
00043     protected $isSessionDecoded = false;
00044 
00045     /**
00046      * decode the session if not already done.
00047      * throws SessionFailureException if strange things happen. 
00048      */
00049     protected function decodeSession() {
00050         if ($this->isSessionDecoded) {
00051             return;
00052         }
00053 
00054         if (!empty ($_COOKIE[SESSION_COOKIE])) {
00055             $data = base64_decode($_COOKIE[SESSION_COOKIE]);
00056             if (false === $data) {
00057                 return;
00058             }
00059 
00060             $data = gzinflate($data);
00061             if (false === $data) {
00062                 return;
00063             }
00064 
00065             $data = mcrypt_decrypt( MCRYPT_BLOWFISH, SESSION_STRING, $data, MCRYPT_MODE_ECB);
00066 
00067             $this->sessionData = unserialize($data);
00068             if (false === $this->sessionData) {
00069                 $this->sessionData = array ();
00070                 return;
00071             }
00072 
00073             $hash = is($this->sessionData['Config.hash'], '');
00074             unset ($this->sessionData['Config.hash']);
00075             if ($hash != $this->calculateHash()) {
00076                 $this->sessionData = array ();
00077                 return;
00078             }
00079         }
00080 
00081         $this->isSessionDecoded = true;
00082     }
00083 
00084     protected function encodeSession() {
00085         $this->sessionData['Config.hash'] = $this->calculateHash();
00086         $data = base64_encode(gzdeflate(mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_BLOWFISH,SESSION_STRING,serialize($this->sessionData), MCRYPT_MODE_ECB)));
00087         unset ($this->sessionData['Config.hash']);
00088 
00089         setcookie(SESSION_COOKIE, $data, time() + SESSION_TIMEOUT, $this->path, $this->domain);
00090     }
00091 
00092     /**
00093      * read value(s) from the session container.
00094      * returns all currently set values if called with null
00095      * returns null when nothing could be found under the name you gave
00096      * @param string $name name under which the value(s) are to find
00097      */
00098     public function read($name = null) {
00099         if (CLI) {
00100             return false;
00101         }
00102         if ($this->initSession(true)) {
00103             $this->decodeSession();
00104             if (empty ($name)) {
00105                 return $this->sessionData;
00106             }
00107             if (isset ($this->sessionData[$name])) {
00108                 return $this->sessionData[$name];
00109             }
00110         }
00111         return null;
00112     }
00113 
00114     /**
00115      * write mixed values to the session-component.
00116      * @param string $name identifier, may contain alphanumeric characters or .-_
00117      * @param mixed $value values to store
00118      */
00119     public function write($name, $value) {
00120         if ($this->preamble($name, false)) {
00121             $this->decodeSession();
00122             $this->sessionData[$name] = $value;
00123             $this->encodeSession();
00124             return true;
00125         }
00126         return false;
00127     }
00128 
00129     /**
00130      * write multiple key value arrays to session-component
00131      * @param $arr array with key-value pairs
00132      */
00133     public function writeArray($arr) {
00134         if (CLI) {
00135             return false;
00136         }
00137         if ($this->initSession(false)) {
00138             $this->decodeSession();
00139             foreach ($arr as $k => $v) {
00140                 $this->validateKeyName($k);
00141                 $this->sessionData[$k] = $v;
00142             }
00143             $this->encodeSession();
00144             return true;
00145         }
00146         return false;
00147     }
00148 
00149     /**
00150      * delete values stored under given name from the session-container
00151      * @param string $name identifier
00152      */
00153     public function delete($name) {
00154         if ($this->preamble($name, false)) {
00155             $this->decodeSession();
00156             unset ($this->sessionData[$name]);
00157             $this->encodeSession();
00158             return true;
00159         }
00160         return false;
00161     }
00162 
00163     /**
00164      * destroy any current session and all variables stored in the session-container with it
00165      */
00166     public function destroy() {
00167         $this->sessionData = array ();
00168         $this->clearCookie();
00169     }
00170 }
